price: Kandi mu by’ukuri iyo (Qur’an) iri Iwacu mu gitabo gihatse ibindi byose,[1] rwose irahambaye kandi yuje ubuhanga.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ
footnotes: [1] Igitabo gihatse ibindi kivugwa muri uyu murongo ni urubaho rurinzwe rwanditsweho igeno ry’ibizaba kuzageza ku munsi w’imperuka (Lawuh ul Mah’fudhi).

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
